application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Submission of details (including samples and specifications) of all materials to be used on the external faces of the development, pursuant to Condition 13; details including drawings in plan, section and elevation at a scale of no less than 1:20 of each of the three gable elevations, pursuant to Condition 15; details (including material, colour and finish) and drawings in plan, section and elevation at a scale of no less than 1:10 of all new rooflights, dormers, window bays and door bays, pursuant to Condition 16; details of any hard landscaping to external areas, pursuant to Condition 17; details of a statement of how the development will meet the requirements of Section 2b of the 'Secured by Design Homes 2019' guidance document (Version 2, March 2019), pursuant to Condition 18; details of a Ventilation Strategy Report to mitigate the impact of air pollution, pursuant to Condition 19; and details of the means of achieving an enhanced sound insulation value DnT,w + Ctr [and L'nT,w] of at least 5dB above the current Building Regulations value, for the floor/ceiling/wall structures separating different types of rooms/uses in adjoining dwellings, pursuant to Condition 21 of planning permission reference: 2019/01306/FUL dated 7th July 2020.
